attributes.action: No To Taking Peoples Homes to Pay for Care
attributes.additional_details: We call on Ministers to say NO to peoples homes being sold to pay for care and safeguard their human rights of a right to family life. Pensioners should not have to pay for Government mistakes. Say no to £150000.00 per couple being taken from them. It is not right and it is not fair.

rejection.details: Please see: One's own home to be exempt Care Home fees
